description: [ROADSWEEP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1150) has been digitally signed with a certificate issued to the Kuwait Telecommunications Company KSC.(Citation: CISA Iran Albanian Attacks September 2022)

external_references.description: CISA. (2022, September 23). AA22-264A Iranian State Actors Conduct Cyber Operations Against the Government of Albania. Retrieved August 6, 2024.
